flawed_nl_solution:
To make 200 of the first type of shirt, they will need 200*3=<<200*3=600>>600 buttons.
To make 200 of the second type of shirt, they will need 200*5=<<200*5=10000>>10000 buttons.
To manufacture 200 each of both types of shirts, they will need to use 600+10000=10600 buttons.
#### 10600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
